attributes.action: MAKE IT A PRIORITY TO WIDEN THE M5 MOTORWAY AND A30 INTO CORNWALL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The M5 / A30 and other A roads in Cornwall are just not capable of carrying all that traffic, especially in the summer holiday season. Cornwall is Britain's only escape from the ratrace and millions of people head down there every year. It's a bottle- neck! Add an accident to the equation and you could be stuck on those roads for hours. As much as everyone else, I wouldn't like to spoil Cornwall and its tranquillity, but needs must...

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the use of block capital letters
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
